Posts.Content: Hey just wanted to say i got diagnoised with breast cancer at 24 years old im now just turned 25 i had a mascetomy and just been through 6 months of chemo got radiotherapy starting in a few weeks, its not that rare anymore ive met alot of under 30s with breast cancer, its a daunting process but your daughter will come out of this stronger, as ive been through it i would just say to help her just be there for her she will need alot of support help her get rest as much as possible, xx
Posts.Title: 25 year old and breast cancer

Posts.Content: Hey i was supposed to have my first tax 2moro but ive got the flu so theyve delayed it because if you have the flu and have tax could end up being admitted in hospital and didnt want that so next one is next wed day after ny 25th birthday great! I am also worrying about tax ive heard loads of things about it and there not nice so hoping it doesnt effect us to bad eh! X
